experiences.name: Ridgeline Apps Internship
accomplishments: Wrote a charting library from the ground up and integrated it into live application.
Starting with no prior experience, became go-to person for questions about testing, React and Typescript in about 5 weeks
Used developer feedback to streamline chart-creation functions and make library easy to modify
Learned how to write unit and integration tests and acheived 99% test coverage.

experiences.name: UCSB Chemical Engineering Research Assistant
accomplishments: Led redesign of crystal growth application.
Leveraged code profiler to speed make algorithms 2 to 10 times faster.
Explained application to users over Zoom
Wrote extensive documentation based on user feedback.
Wrote a [paper on novel algorithms](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S009813541930941X) I developed to simulate and visualize crystal growth mechanisms.
Hired and trained another student to continue development when I leave.
Quickly learned MATLAB and cutting-edge crystallography research despite no prior experience
Taught coworkers Git and managed Github repository.
Added regression tests for crystal shape predictions
Worked in team of 3 to design, manufacture and program a mechanical arm that drew pictures with a pen
Designed and 3D printed pen holder using SolidWorks
Operated metal fabrication tools (lathe, drill press, tapping machine, band saw) to build arm from scratch
Programmed Python sketching program for computer
Wrote C program for Arduino to control 2 stepper motors and 1 servo motor to draw picture
Debugged serial connection between computer and Arduino

experiences.name: IEEE Extreme Coding Competition
accomplishments: Used data structures (arrays, stacks, trees) to model and solve challenging problems
Reduced computational complexity to reduce runtime within time limit
Ranked in top 7% of competitors (international college and graduate students)

experiences.name: IEEE Natcar Competition
accomplishments: Led software development on team of 5 people to control a small autonomous car around a track
Implemented image processing to capture track information from a picture
Part of UCSB's first Natcar team in 4 years to complete complete a lap around the track.
Wrote efficient cyclic buffer for taking quick averaged measurements with Arduino.
